Text: FW BN Why Should Enrons Employees Be Owed Anything MichaOriginal Message From BRIAN CLANCY SALOMON SMITH BARNEY mailto Sent Monday February PM To Lewis James W Subject BN Why Should Enrons Employees Be Owed Anything Micha SEE FILE This was prepared for informational purposes only It is not an official confirmation of terms It is based on infor mation generally available to the public from sources believed to be reliable No representation is made that it is accurate or complete or that any returns indicated will be achieved Changes to assumptions may have a material impact on returns Past performance is not indicative of future results Priceavailability subject to change without notice Additional info available on request This is neither an offerto sell nor a solicitation of any offer to buy a new security For further info on a new issue including a prospectusplease contact your Salomon Smith Barney salesperson
